Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1233 WEST LOOP SOUTH,SUITE 1400, HOUSTON, Texas, 77027, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Select Energy Services Inc is a provider of total water solutions to the United States oil and gas industry. Its services are water treatment, fluids handling, disposal solutions, and flowback and well testing among others. The group operates in three segments namely Water Services, Water Infrastructure, and Oilfield Chemicals. It generates a majority of its revenue from the Water services segment.
